job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you a forward-thinking developer eager to harness the power of GenAI to redefine business standards and enhance productivity? Are you bored of solving the same customer support tickets or resolving the same bugs over and over again?, * Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs. This includes not only development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets. One example would be creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process.
     * Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer, while providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows.
     * Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures, notably AWS, and ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction., * Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality
job_details.full_text:
AI Software Engineer, IgniteTech (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

Are you a forward-thinking developer eager to harness the power of GenAI to redefine business standards and enhance productivity? Are you bored of solving the same customer support tickets or resolving the same bugs over and over again?, * Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs. This includes not only development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets. One example would be creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process.
     * Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer, while providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows.
     * Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures, notably AWS, and ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction., * Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development, fine-tuning, and deployment of applications built on large language models (LLMs) and generative AI technologies. Specific mentions of creating autonomous support platforms using LLMs, integrating state-of-the-art AI like GPT-4 Vision, and enhancing AI solutions across infrastructures like AWS, align directly with the core responsibilities and evidence profile of a GenAI Engineer. The focus is on building user-facing systems and applications powered by generative AI, rather than solely on predictive modeling or data engineering.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs' directly refers to the development and adaptation of generative models for specific applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'This includes not only development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets' points to the software engineering aspects of building and maintaining applications.
job_tasks.phrase: This includes not only development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets

job_tasks.justification: The example 'creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process' describes the development of a user-facing application.
job_tasks.phrase: creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision' indicates working with and integrating advanced generative AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows' shows an understanding of how AI can be applied to business processes.
job_tasks.phrase: providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions' implies working with and improving AI models and their performance.
job_tasks.phrase: Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'across different infrastructures, notably AWS, and ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction' points to the operational aspects of deploying and maintaining AI solutions in production environments.
job_tasks.phrase: across different infrastructures, notably AWS, and ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality' highlights the business impact and strategic alignment of the AI work.
job_tasks.phrase: Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality
